input2:
He is 61 yo retired colonel developed profound fatigue, myalgias, anorexia, and non-productive cough three days ago. Since then has had chiils, occasional rigors, and very poor apetite. Has not been eating or drinking well for the past 3 days. Denies shortness of breath or pain. No GI symptoms. No HA, visual changes, neurologic symptoms. Has chronic post-nasal drip and sinus drainage. Had PNA once. ROS: all other systems negative x "feeling very cold", with chills during my examination.

No sick contacts at home. Did receive influenza vaccination this season.

In ED, he was febrile to 102.9, HR=107, BP=135/78 RR=18 SaO2=96% RA
input3:
+CAD- S/P MI with stent (type of stent not known)
+Hyperlipidemia
+PUD - bleeding ulcer
+Gastric hamartoma
input4:
+Family History:
+Mother deceased in heart failure
+One brother - schizophrenia
+One sister-epilepsy
+Two biological sons - both healthy
input5:
Very pleasant gentleman. Having rigors. No respiratory distress.
T=99.9  BP=121/79  HR=96 RR=18  SaO2=99%RA
HEENT - dry mucous membranes, otherwise negative
Neck-no JVD, no adenopathy, no carotid bruits, 2+ carotids
Lungs-CTAB
CV-RR, no m/r/g
Abd-soft, NT, ND, NABS
Extr-no edema, well-perfused.
Skin-good turgor, no rashes.
Neuro - negative screening examination. A&O xe. Speech normal.
